revisions.rev:
{{Infobox political party |country = Egypt |colorcode = Red |name_english = The Egyptian Socialist Party |name_native = El-Hizb El-Ishtraki El-Masri |logo = [[File:Socialist Party Egypt Logo.jpg|200px]] |founder = Samir Amin, Ahmed Bahaa El-Din Shaaban, Mamdouh Habashi and Eman Yehia |leader = |chairman = Ahmed Bahaa El-Din Shaaban |president = |secretary = |spokesperson = |foundation = June 18, 2011 |dissolution = |headquarters = [[Cairo]], [[Egypt]] |newspaper = |youth_wing = |membership_year = |membership = |ideology = [[Democratic socialism]]
[[Communism]] |position = [[Left-wing politics|Left-wing]] |national = [[The Revolution Continues Alliance]] |international = |affiliation1_title = |affiliation1 = |colours = Red |seats1_title = [[People's Assembly of Egypt |People's Assembly]] |seats1 = {{Infobox political party/seats|0|508|hex={{Freedom and Justice Party (Egypt)/meta/color}}}} }} The '''Egyptian Socialist Party''' is a new political party in [[Egypt]] which was founded by some Egyptian socialists after the [[2011 Egyptian revolution]].http://elbadil.net/%D8%A5%D8%B9%D9%84%D8%A7%D9%86-%D8%AA%D8%A3%D8%B3%D9%8A%D8%B3-%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%AD%D8%B2%D8%A8-%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%A7%D8%B4%D8%AA%D8%B1%D8%A7%D9%83%D9%8A-%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%85%D8%B5%D8%B1%D9%8A-%D8%A8%D9%86/. The party was founded on June 18 at a conference attended by over 400 Egyptian & international socialists {{cite news|first=|last=|title=Hundreds gather to found Egyptian Socialist Party |url=http://www.workers.org/2011/world/egyptian_socialist_party_0707/ |work=Worker's World |publisher= |date=2011-07-04 |accessdate=2011-11-11}}. Members such as [[Karima El-Hefnawy]] and chairmman [[Ahmed Bahaa El-Din Shaaban]] were prominent leaders of the [[Kefaya]] movement {{cite news|first=|last=|title=Egyptian Socialist Party |url=http://bikyamasr.com/egypt-elections-2011/egyptian-socialist-party/ |work=Bikya Masr |publisher= |date=2011-11-11 |accessdate=2011-11-11}}. Party member [[Mamdouh Habashi]] has stated that the Egyptian Socialist Party sees "the uprising of January 25 not as the revolution, but just the start of a new, long revolutionary tide" {{cite news|first=|last=|title=Interview with the Egyptian Socialist Party |url=http://thawraeyewitness.blogspot.com/2011/10/interview-with-egyptian-socialist-party.html |work=Al-Thawra Eyewitness |publisher= |date=2011-10-25 |accessdate=2011-11-11}} [[File:Banner from the Egyptian Socialist Party.jpg|thumb|150px|left|Banner from the Egyptian Socialist Party]] The party has a membership of over 1000 {{cite news|first=|last=|title=Egyptian socialists: 'Revolution has just begun' |url=http://www.greenleft.org.au/node/49285 |work=[[Green Left Weekly]] |publisher= |date=2011-10-30 |accessdate=2011-11-11}}, with branches established in cities such as Mansoura, Aswan and Luxor as well as Cairo and Alexandria. In addition to involvement with the ongoing protests in [[Tahrir Square]], members of the Egyptian Socialist Party are also involved with such issues as the rights of inhabitants of informal settlements in [[Cairo]], and helped in organising protests and strikes amongst these communities in August 2011. Other areas of work for party members include independent trade unions and environmental issues. On 10 May 2011, the Egyptian Socialist Party agreed to enter into a [[Coalition of Socialist Forces]] with four other Egyptian leftist groups called, which includes the [[Revolutionary Socialists (Egypt)|Revolutionary Socialists]], the [[Socialist Popular Alliance Party]], the [[Egyptian Communist Party]] and the [[Workers Democratic Party]]. For the [[Egyptian parliamentary election, 2011â2012|2011-2012 parliamentary election]], the Egyptian Socialist Party joined the "[[The Revolution Continues Alliance|Revolution Continues]]" alliance {{cite news|first=|last=|title=Revolution Continues |url=http://english.ahram.org.eg/NewsContent/33/103/26720/Elections-/Electoral-Alliances/Revolution-Continues.aspx |work=[[Ahram Online]] |publisher= |date=2011-11-18 |accessdate=2011-11-28}}. == References == {{Reflist}} {{Egyptian political parties}} [[Category:Activism]] [[Category:Political parties established in 2011]] [[Category:Political parties in Egypt]] [[Category:Socialism in Egypt]] [[Category:2011 establishments in Egypt]]
